title: Roblox User Playstyle Analysis & Archetype Profiling Service

sections.heading: Service Overview
content: This service analyzes Roblox users' playstyle and behavior based on user-consented data.
Results are presented as MBTI-like Archetypes.
The focus is entertainment-driven insights with a privacy-first design, not exact gameplay tracking.

sections.heading: Core Concept
bullets: Public Roblox data combined with survey-based signals
Only derived behavioral insights are stored
Global service with Korean and English language support

items.name: Explorer
items.description: Enjoys discovering new games and genres.

items.name: Grinder
items.description: Focuses on long-term progression and repetition.

items.name: Competitor
items.description: Enjoys PvP, ranking, and skill improvement.

items.name: Builder
items.description: Interested in creating, building, and customization.

items.name: Trader
items.description: Focused on item value and trading.

items.name: Roleplayer
items.description: Immerses in story, character, and roleplay.

items.name: Casual
items.description: Light, short play sessions without deep focus.

sections.heading: Scoring Logic
content: Survey-based signals contribute 70% of the final score.
Public data-based signals contribute 30% of the final score.
Each archetype score is normalized between 0 and 1.
Final output includes primary archetype, secondary archetype, and confidence score.

sections.heading: Data Storage Strategy
bullets: Raw data is cached temporarily only
Long-term storage contains derived metrics only
Users can revoke consent and request deletion at any time
